full_summary:
=====================================

**Advance Contract Award Notice - Digital Service Prototype**
-----------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**: cb-638-91046017
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Publication Date**: May 23, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: June 7, 2024, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date**: None
**Expected Contract End Date**: None

**Summary**
-----------

The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites bids for the development of a digital service prototype to support a new youth-focused initiative. The objective is to produce a high-fidelity prototype, or proof of concept, to test concepts for a digital service solution with users.

**Description**
-------------

The digital service prototype will be a cloud-based software as a service (SaaS) solution that supports direct engagement with key stakeholders, facilitates connections among users via secure chat or messaging functions, and meets digital expectations of youth. It will also have the same look and feel as the current [Canada.ca](https://www.canada.ca) website and will be a low-code solution allowing ESDC to make basic modifications as required.

**Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity**
---------------------------------------------

This tender is open to vendors that have certified businesses under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

The regions of opportunity for this tender are the National Capital Region (NCR) and across Canada.

**Classification**
---------------

This tender is classified under the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) *81162000* - Cloud-based Software as a Service.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information or to obtain a copy of the RFP, please contact:

Melissa Proulx
Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Phone: 9999999
Address: 140 promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0J9, Canada

--------------
